resources.string: My Name is Ghebre. I live in Seattle. This is my third quarter at North Seattle College. Before that, I completed an associate degree in both Web Development and Programming and Certificate in Database. I am full time student, father of three, and Full time worker. I am excited to take Android Development.
Full time student at NSC doing BAS
This is my app that reflects the skills that I am learning in Android Development
Welcome to my beautiful app! It is such a very zero draft app! Enjoy!
